text:
At least 10 days prior to the relocation date on the notice in Section 
65.7 above, the owner shall offer the tenant the services of a mover or a payment of $400 per room. 
(Added by Ord. 220-92, App. 7/14/92)

chapter.text: RENT REDUCTION AND RELOCATION PLAN FOR TENANTS INCONVENIENCED BY SEISMIC WORK PERFORMED PURSUANT TO CHAPTERS 14 AND 15 OF THE SAN FRANCISCO BUILDING CODE
